section_subtitle: We offer a range of NDIS-funded support services tailored to your individual goals across the Lockyer Valley, Ipswich & surrounds. Wildflower DSS is here to help you live your best life.
title: Domestic Assistance
description: Assistance with daily tasks like cooking, cleaning, personal care, and household duties — right in the comfort of your own home.

title: Respite / STA
description: Short Term Accommodation and respite services that give family carers a well-deserved break, while your loved one receives outstanding support.

title: Community Access
description: We help you stay connected — from social outings and shopping trips to attending appointments, events, and recreational activities.

title: Yard Maintenance
description: Keeping your outdoor spaces safe, tidy, and enjoyable with regular lawn mowing, garden care, and general yard upkeep.

title: Supported Independent Living (SIL)
description: 24/7 support in a shared or individual living arrangement, helping you build daily living skills and live as independently as possible.
